oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Hank Williams Mother's Best show - #163 - WSM
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: First recording contains excerpts of various Aunt Jemima jingles, plugs, and performances by Tommy Sosebee (performer), the Beasley Sisters (performers), and Louis Buck (announcer). Second Recording contains various cut-ins and Mother's Best plugs by Hank Williams and Louis Buck. Third recording is of Hank Williams' Mother's Best show, featuring Louis Buck (announcer), Hank Williams (performer, host), Don Helms (performer) and Jerry Rivers (performer), listed as show #163 on radio station WSM (Nashville, Tenn.)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Williams; Jerry Rivers; Don Helms; Tommy Sosebee; The Beasley Sisters
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: [Unidentified] talks -- Aunt Jemima jingle -- Opening statement -- [Unidentified] introduces Tommy Sosebee -- Don't Forget (Tommy Sosebee) [unconfirmed] -- Aunt Jemima plug (Louis Buck) -- I Can't Help It (Beasley Sisters) -- Tommy Sosebee talks -- Aunt Jemima plug (Louis Buck) -- [Unidentified] talks -- Jealous Heart (Tommy Sosebee) -- [Unidentified] and Tommy Sosebee talk -- Aunt Jemima jingle -- Closing statement (Louis Buck) -- [Unidentified] talks -- Aunt Jemima jingle -- Opening statement -- How Can You Smile (Tommy Sosebee) (incomplete) -- [Unidentified] talks -- Aunt Jemima jingle -- Opening statement -- How Can You Smile (Tommy Sosebee) -- Tommy Sosebee talks -- Aunt Jemima plug (Louis Buck) -- Honey, Be My Honey Bee (Beasley Sisters) -- Aunt Jemima plug (Louis Buck) -- Tommy Sosebee talks -- I Come To The Garden Alone (Tommy Sosebee) -- Closing statement -- Hank Williams talks (incomplete) -- Mother's Best plug (Louis Buck) -- Mother's Best plug (Hank Williams) -- Mother's Best plug (Hank Williams and Louis Buck) -- Mother's Best plug (Hank Williams and Louis Buck) -- Hank Williams talks -- Mother's Best plug (Louis Buck) -- Mother's Best plug (Hank Williams) -- Mother's Best plug (Hank Williams and Louis Buck) -- Opening statement (Louis Buck) -- Opening theme -- Hank Williams talks and introduces the first tune -- I'll Sail My Ship Alone (Hank Williams) -- Hank Williams talks -- Mother's Best plug (Hank Williams and Louis Buck) -- Hank Williams talks and introduces the next tune -- Little Annie (Don Helms steel guitar and Jerry Rivers fiddle) -- Hank Williams talks and introduces the next tune -- I'll Have A New Body (Hank Williams) -- Mother's Best plug (Louis Buck) -- Closing statement (Hank Williams and Louis Buck) -- Closing theme
